last_episode_to_air.name: The Truth
last_episode_to_air.overview: As the Detective works to unravel the Captain’s convoluted plot, Doru and Ionel grapple with the difficult decisions that all stemmed from their ill-fated joke.

name: Tuff Money
overview: After two hapless stoplight technicians make an offhand joke about an imaginary heist, everyone in their small Romanian town suddenly wants a piece of the pie – forcing the pair to make a decision that could change their lives forever.
tagline: Trust no one - but the bank robbers.

episodes.name: The Joke
episodes.overview: After cracking an offhand joke about planning a heist, Doru and Ionel catch the attention of a local mobster, who attempts to strong-arm the pair into actually going through with the crime.

episodes.name: The Job
episodes.overview: Doru and Ionel face a potentially deadly decision as Adi, Evelina, and the Captain increase the pressure.

episodes.name: The Split
episodes.overview: As Doru and Ionel weigh their options, Adi’s decision to shortchange Evelina complicates things for the group, while the Captain faces the arrival of a detective from Bucharest.

episodes.name: The Hunt
episodes.overview: While Adi and Evelina work to outsmart the investigation, the Captain deals with a new threat. Meanwhile, Doru and Ionel attempt to make good use their newfound “nest egg.”

episodes.name: The Cut
episodes.overview: As the investigation nears to a close, tips about the robbery flood the system. Then, while the Captain does his best to fend off an attempted extortion, Doru and Ionel consider coming clean.

episodes.name: The Truth
episodes.overview: As the Detective works to unravel the Captain’s convoluted plot, Doru and Ionel grapple with the difficult decisions that all stemmed from their ill-fated joke.
